ad.title: English nanny and tutor
ad.content:
Dear parents,

I am a 30 year old English female living in Gujan Mestras. I have been working in France for 6 years as a Private Nanny and English teacher for young children. A little more about me, I have a warm, caring, kind nature and love to take care of those around me. I have experience with babies and children from 3 months old - 15 years old. I enjoy being in an environment where I can interact with children, encouraging learning through playtime and activities. I am naturally a vigilant individual with a high sense of responsibility and authority. I have always found it very rewarding to teach children, helping them towards their personal development and growth. I am dedicated, punctual, conscientious, emotionally supportive and always take discretion very seriously.  As well as ensuring the security and well-being of children, I can also teach them good etiquette and good manners, help to encourage children's creativity and overall development. I have a clear, well-spoken English accent. Although my comprehension is much stronger, I speak intermediate french.

I shall look forward to hearing from you
